items.head: LOST
items.textTpl: Orange cat ‘Marlowe’. Last seen near Block {witnessBlock} apartments.

items.head: REWARD
items.textTpl: Cash reward for credible tips connected to Case File {caseFile}. Leave info at the front desk.

items.head: TOWING
items.textTpl: 24/7 towing servicing Block {hotBlock} first. Accidents welcome.

items.head: CASH
items.textTpl: Pawn & trade buzzing near Block {weaponBlock}. Watches, tools, ‘collectibles’.

items.head: NOTICE
items.textTpl: Commonville Hospital blood drive today. Walk-ins accepted through 6PM.

items.head: SERVICES
items.textTpl: Home security consults available in {neighborhoodB}. Cameras, alarms, lighting.

items.head: FINANCE
items.textTpl: Stone Bank & Trust: safe deposit boxes available. Ask about small-business rates.

items.head: OPEN LATE
items.textTpl: Sitz Coffee Shop open late tonight in {neighborhoodA}. Strong coffee, stronger opinions.

items.head: FOOD
items.textTpl: Ole’s Donut Shop: pre-orders for early shifts. Call before midnight.

items.head: WANTED
items.textTpl: Witnesses sought near Snyder’s Liquors. Cash for information. No questions.

items.head: TRAVEL
items.textTpl: Commonville Hotel: weeknight rates available. Ask about ‘shift worker’ discounts.

items.head: EVENT
items.textTpl: Duffy’s Bar: live music tonight. Please be respectful of neighbors.

items.head: FOR RENT
items.textTpl: Storage unit available near {neighborhoodC}. Clean, dry, 24/7 access.

items.head: HELP WANTED
items.textTpl: Dock workers needed at a local warehouse. Night shifts. Paid weekly.

items.head: HOUSING
items.textTpl: Knight’s Apartments: studios and one-beds. Quiet building. Background check required.

items.head: HOUSING
items.textTpl: Paris Apartments: newly painted units. No loud parties. Call for showing.

items.head: COUPONS
items.textTpl: Patsouras Grocer weekly specials. Clip in-store coupon sheet.

items.head: FOUND
items.textTpl: Ring found near Jake’s Pawnshop. Describe engraving to claim.

items.head: SERVICES
items.textTpl: Munder Difflin: bulk forms and fast printing. Keep your case file clean.

items.head: NOTICE
items.textTpl: Internal Affairs intake: confidential reports accepted weekdays. Ref: {caseFile}.

items.head: COMMUNITY
items.textTpl: Neighborhood watch meeting tonight in {neighborhoodA}. Bring a flashlight and your questions.

items.head: FOUND
items.textTpl: Keys found near Block {witnessBlock}. Describe keychain to claim.

items.head: HELP WANTED
items.textTpl: Night runner needed — fast pickups across {neighborhoodB}. Reliable vehicle required.

items.head: SERVICES
items.textTpl: Late-night babysitter available in {neighborhoodC}. References upon request.

items.head: SALE
items.textTpl: Yard sale in {neighborhoodA}. Tools, lamps, old board games. Early birds welcome.
